name: Help Fund Our Album
description:
As many of you know, we are working with the amazingly talented Brett Hestla on this album. Along with being the lead singer in Dark New Day, Brett has produced albums for Framing Hanley and Tantric as well as our friends Ideal Zero, Beth Current, and countless others. He's even lent us his skills by playing lead guitar and bass on our entire album so far. So as you can see, this album is being taken very seriously and hopefully it'll knock your socks off. This is where you come in. 

 We are at the half way point of recording our album. We have funded this entire project ourselves so far but it takes quite a while to save the money needed for studio time. In order to get this album out in a timely manner we need your help. Any amount you can donate will not go unnoticed or unappreciated. Listed below are the donation levels and rewards associated with each donation amount. You can donate as many times as you'd like, we'll keep track of your donations and you'll graduate to bigger prizes!

$5 - Virtual High-Five and We'll be thinking of you while we record!

$10 - We'll email mp3's of the album to you when we finish it!

$20 - We'll mail a physical copy of the album to you with a lovely thank you note and a guitar pick used while recording.

$50 - Signed Copy of the CD, guitar pick and a cool T-Shirt!!

$100 - Signed Cd, T-Shirt, Lifetime VIP lanyard and your name in the credits!

$500 - All of the above plus an invitation to our in studio listening party in Orlando FL!!! (Hotel and Travel not included)

options.name: Thank You!! MP3's Coming your way!!!
Thanks for your Jackson, We'll send you our Handcock!!!
Thanks for GRANTing our wish!! You get new music and new threads!!!
Breaking out the Benjamin!!! VIP Style!!!
HOLY COW!!!! YOU ARE LEGEN...wait for it...DARY!!!!!!

name: Calefactor ROUND1 Tee
description:
Gildan -  "Dry Blend" Cotton T-Shirt

Available in White or Grey

These shirts are PRE-ORDER 
Please allow 3 - 4 weeks for delivery

All Profits go toward funding the recording of our album.

name: Calefactor ROUND1 PREMIUM Tee
description:
Canvas - Polyester/Cotton blend

Lightweight - 52% cotton/ 48% polyester

THESE SHIRTS ARE FORM FITTING!
If you have a few curves you dont want to show off we recommend choosing 1 size larger than what you normally wear.

These shirts are also a PRE-ORDER item. 
Please allow 3 - 4 weeks for delivery

All Profits go to funding the recording of our album
